description: Join the new faction of Responders as they help the members of The Union trapped in The Pitt and unlock bonus in-game digital themed cosmetic and C.A.M.P. items, including the Pittsburgh Neighborhood C.A.M.P. Kit, Fanatic Power Armor Paint, and more!

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Poppy Playtime Panic
description: The Poppy Playtime Panic DLC is a limited time new level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. In this content you can explore and try to survive in the Playtime Co. toy factory based on the original Poppy Playtime game. Characters in this DLC include Huggy Wuggy and Kissy Missy based on the original Poppy Playtime game.

name: Black Room
description: "Black Room," is a browser-based, narrative game about falling asleep while on your computer, on the internet. You play as an insomniac on the verge of sleep, moving through shifting states of consciousness. Hallucinatory, pixelated visions of landscapes filled with sprites ripped directly from the arcade/NES/SNES video games of your childhood appear and disappear as you click through fragile internet spaces. Point-n-click mini games are scattered throughout the narrative.

name: Warp Nexus
description: With a deep, dynamic, player-controlled economy built on Unreal Engine 5, Warp Nexus is a community-driven spaceship MMO and trading game accessible through the STARL Metaverse. Start with 16 sectors and species, customize your ships and characters, battle, trade, make alliances or choose piracy to conquer galaxies. Trade or battle for assets that can be either gameside or blockchain side depending on the user's preference. With zero pay to win advantages, this game is all about a player's skill and knowledge gained through the game economy and battling.

name: Dodgeball Championship League
description: A physics based dodgeball league game with 32 unique teams.

name: House Flipper Pets VR
description: No amount of floor stains, destroyed carpets or chewed slippers can outweigh the joy you feel while playing with your four-legged friend. In House Flipper Pets VR both the time spent with your dog and the apartment renovation are nothing less than recreation!

name: Pitch Silent
description: The Earth has withered away. Guided by an angel in the dark. You must brave the underground of Eden to find the all forms of creation to rekindle the light.

name: Stellinavra
description: An erotic sci-fi rpg set aboard a derelict space station. Its retro aesthetic is styled after the Amiga.

name: Vroom Racing
description:
Drive a Formula 1 car upon 18 worldwide tracks. Reach 380 Km/h and beat the ghost!
Tracks include: Argentina, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Egypt, France, Germany, India, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Portugal, Russia, Spain, UK, USA

name: Survivor.io
description:
Dangerous zombies are attacking the entire city! The city is in peril!
Awakened by the trial of dreams, you've no choice but to take on the heroic mantle of saving the city!
As a human warrior with unlimited potential, you and other survivors will have to pick up your weapons and battle these evil and dangerous zombies!
The horde far outnumbers you - any slip-up and you'll get caught in dire straits!
Faced with crisis, you must find a way to survive!

name: MILF Conditioning
description: Sin descripción

name: Pui Pui Molcartchi Driving School ver.
description: The Driving School version is the second released of the PUI PUI Molcartchi set to be released on February 4, 2023. It is based off the second season of the series and features more molcars to raise.

name: Sonic Smash Brothers
description: A flash-based Sonic fighting fangame based on Super Smash Bros. franchise. It has some characters from Sonic franchise and a campagin mode.

name: Elemental
description: Sudoku-like game involving combining elements to create different materials.

name: I Die a Lovely Life
description: Long distance girlfriends Uni and Nuña are aching to meet, but neither of them can afford the plane tickets. Willing to do anything for money, Uni participates in a research study to have her brain uploaded into a computer... irreversibly?! Oops. But we can still hook up though, right?

name: Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions - Scaryfolks Puzzle Pack
description: Continue your adventure in the Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions with 9 new puzzles where fantasy arts meets scary folks characters in stained glass - FREE demo puzzle included!

name: Sidrial
description:
In a star system far from Earth, there is intelligent life. Driven by conquest, a race more advanced than Humans - and far more brutal - has waged a war against all sentient beings. They will destroy anything in their path, as they have done for thousands of years. The OVERLORDS, a bloodthirsty race bent on power and destruction, have annihilated every inhabited planet in their wake. Sidrial, one of the last planets standing, is the last outpost between Earth and the Overlords. With most of Sidrial destroyed, a new breed has risen to fight back against the tyrants. As the Sidrilian Rebel Forces fight back and struggle to join with others against the OVERLORDS, new alliances will be forged and the future of entire galaxies will depend on their success.

In Sidrial, you make your escape from some sort of prison that seems to be devoid of life.

name: Dream of a Sunflower
description: Touhou meets Dark Souls. Also Yuuka wanders into someone's dream and decides to cause trouble. What could go wrong?

name: Mario Party Kuru-kuru! Carnival
description: Mario Party Kuru-kuru! Carnival, is an arcade game based on Mario Party 8 that was developed by Capcom. The game was released exclusively in Japan in 2012, and supports up to four players. It is the fourth Mario Party arcade game developed by Capcom and the seventeenth installment overall.

name: Donkey Kong Jungle Fever
description: Arcade medal game by Capcom, based on the Donkey Kong franchise and a successor to Donkey Kong Jungle Beat.

name: Mario Party Challenge World
description: Altered version of Mario Party Fushigi no Challenge World meant to be released in North America. Mario Party Challenge World was planned to be distributed by Raw Thrills in North America, being shown (in an early form) at IAAPA 2017. However, the American release would later be canceled, though several of the prototype units were still sold to various arcade locations. The "final" Raw Thrills version of the game was drastically different from the Japanese original, to the point where it is effectively a different game entirely (lacking the roulette wheel, a touchscreen, etc.).

name: Touhou: Phantom Assembler
description: A certain brown-haired Touhou university student ventures into a dream world.

name: Wario Pool
description: Wario Pool was a Wario series Game Boy Color billiards game in development by a British team (possibly Aardvark Software) involving Nick Pelling, Jeff Ferguson. It was officially shown to Nintendo but was rejected. However, the game would later become a title known as 3D Pocket Pool.

name: Super Mario: Fushigi no Janjanland
description:
A rare arcade game found only in Japan, developed by Capcom and released in 2003. It is a single-player Medal Game with many themes from Super Mario Bros. 3, especially the Super Mario Advance 4 version.

Players load their medals so they can shoot them into the machine from the right or left. After that, players use the buttons to fire the coins out on to the field. As they fall down, they fall in one of many pockets that activate points in the game. Mario usually moves around automatically, though each time a coin goes into one of the side pockets, Mario will jump either small or big. Players can trigger many events by getting Mario to jump at the right time.

name: Super Mario Attack
description: Super Mario Attack is a redemption arcade game developed by Banpresto in 1996 based on the 1990 SNES game Super Mario World. The gameplay involves landing Cape Mario on items of different value in medals. Players have the option of doubling or tripling their bet. They must dive within 15 seconds or lose. It was only released in Japan.

name: Reprobate
description:
The city is full of people to watch and you love to watch them.

Don't you want to privately talk to people who have similar "interests" as you, without probes reading your mind? That's what Incog-sym chat is for.

name: Robot Rumpus Royale
description: The year is 2082. Robot battles are all the rage. Fans flock from all four corners of the globe to watch robots duke it out. Competitors rent a bot and send it against a series of other bots. If their bot falls, they lose. But if their bot wins, then the competitors will gain fame and glory (and maybe even a sponsorship) beyond their wildest dreams! You are the latest competitor to challenge the arena. You are randomly assigned a rental bot. Maybe you’ll become the newest champion of the arena. Maybe you’ll fail miserably. Maybe you’re just here to listen to the goofy robot voices. And maybe you’ll get a new friend out of the deal. Who knows!

name: Do Robots Dream of Ice Cream?
description: Bobby the robot's AI has progressed more than his creator, Robert, knows. With his newfound curiosity to experience new things, Bobby decides he wants to try ice cream and see what the big deal is!

name: Sanctified
description: Your Wife and Child are missing. You are alone in a hotel. They've been expecting you. They've always been expecting you.

name: Crimson Keep
description: Chapter 1 of 7 for the flash erotic rpg series by Introspurt

name: The Descent of the Serpent
description: Go back in time to ancient Mesoamerica and help save the world!

name: My Magical Boyfriend
description:
Your beloved grandfather just made you the manager of his apartment complex, but between its bad reputation and strange phenomena, the building is in danger of being demolished…

As if that wasn't enough to deal with, you quickly discover that the complex is a hub for magical beings from distant realms! Now it's up to you and your tenants—a delinquent dragon, a shut-in elf, and an eccentric beastman—to stop your home from being redeveloped. Can you get them to trust you and work together before it's too late?

name: Spider-Man 2 Handheld Game
description: Spider-Man 2 Handheld Game is an LCD handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Penny Arcade: Spider-Man 3: Bell Tower Brawl
description: Penny Arcade: Spider-Man 3: Bell Tower Brawl 3 is an LCD game based on Spider-Man.

name: Alice
description: Take part in the maelstrom of events and put yourself in Alice's shoes! Plunge into a world of real magic! You have to uncover the secrets of the Queen of Hearts, who has cast a spell on Wonderland's time. Drink a shrinking potion and follow the White Rabbit through the twisted mazes of the world behind the looking-glass, where everything is turned upside down. Help the Hatter, who stuck in time, to sort out the mess at the mad tea-party. The Cheshire Cat will guide you through the enchanted thicket of Dark Forest. Save the fairies who know the secret of the evil queen by using the tips of the wise Caterpillar. Find a way to sneak past the card guards into the castle filled with tricky traps to defeat the Queen of Hearts, lift the spell from the main clock tower and save the Wonderland.

name: Hatsune Mikutchi
description: The Hatsune Mikutchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model, released in March 2023, based on Hatsune Miku, a Vocaloid software voice bank developed by Crypton Future Media.

name: Torevetchi
description: The Torevetchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano, released in March 2023, based on the anime and manga series Tokyo Revengers by Ken Wakui.

name: Jujutsutchi 0
description: The Jujutsutchi 0 is the second version of the Jujutsutchi and is set to be released March 2023. It is based off the Jujutsu Kaisen 0 film and features new characters, minigames, and animations.

name: Seaside Sourcery
description: Seaside Sourcery is a text adventure in which the player takes the role of Rodney Prentice, apprentice wizard. Rodney has been sent to Scarpool's finest hotel, The Royal, to receive a prestigious award on behalf of the High Mage. Unfortunately the awards get stolen and the game is all about Rodney's attempts to retrieve them.

name: Sergueis Destiny
description:
The evil sorcerer Blackmagic took over a village named Jolimy. Only a lone apprentice magician named Serguei can eventually defeat him and liberate his homeland.

Serguei's Destiny is made with the AGI interpreter, which was the engine used for Sierra's adventure games in mid- to late 1980's (such as for example the first two Space Quest games). The game is primarily an adventure, but there are RPG elements as well: Serguei accumulates experience and learns new spells by completing quests.

name: Baba Files Taxes
description: Baba needs help filing taxes, and the deadline is tonight! Help Baba in order to make it in time.

name: Nameless Origin
description: Survive with your colleagues in the desperate apocalypse to defeat the enemies. You have to join forces with your colleagues to survive. Swap with your colleague who can better deal with them to defeat the characteristic enemies! Earn and grow your colleagues armed with a powerful ultimate skill and exclusive battle packs! Collect various weapons to become stronger and annihilate your enemies!

name: Rennsport
description: A racing simulation developed in Unreal Engine 5, making use of feedback from professional real world drivers to simulate car physics and behavior in a realistic way.

name: Gpop.io
description: Gpop.io is an io rhythm game where you can create games out of YouTube videos and play with your friends!

name: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Run, jump, wall crawl, sling webs and unleash reading skills in six missions that blend classic Spidey action with active gameplay.

name: R'lyeh Assault
description: Experience hot blinking action, in a brand new LOVECRAFTIAN TALE of uncanny terror! Destroy the All-Mighty CTHULHU, using the powers of the LEGENDARY NECRONOMICON , and free the fishing town of R'LYEH of his power and his DAGON minions. Will you save R'LYEH from CTHULU'S betentacled grasp, or will you lose your sanity in the process?

name: Coin Pusher Casino
description: Coinpusher Casino is a game that brings the excitement of classic coin pusher machines to your computer. With realistic physics and colorful graphics, you'll feel like you're playing the real thing.

name: The Chiral Night: Rhythm Carnival
description: A Nitro+Chiral rhythm game featuring, characters and songs from Nitro+CHiRAL games! as well as a original story.

name: Spellborne
description: Spellborne is an open-ended monster catching MMORPG! Start as one of three hunters, looking to achieve their own goals, and experience a unique adventure in every play-through. Capture monsters, farm crops and craft items in this ever expanding world where each decision you take affects your journey.

name: Vampire Tourist
description:
Vampire Tourist is a new type of immersive experience taking place in Central Europe.
You are a "Vampire in Vacation" that finds himself without powers while in this new land so when the opportunity arises to get them back things get complicated.
Experience the European streets and atmosphere during the night (as well as day) and capture the best shots while finding our more about the city, it's mysteries and maybe about yourself.

name: My Muppets Show
description: My Muppets Show is a mobile game app featuring the characters from the Muppets franchise.

name: Garden
description:
After finding out, you seem to be lost in a strange garden...
I wonder how do you get out of here?
Use your wits and ideas to make the escape successful.

name: Hill Cliff Horse: Online
description: Online Multiplayer, Chat, Role play, and Ragdoll with friends and players around the world!

name: AIDS Watashi o Aishite... Jin'ai Seijin
description: Main hero is an ordinary salary-man of 25 years old. He has a girlfriend, but they have not spent much time together since the beginning of the week. Now hero gets a bonus payment at work. How will she spend the money?

name: The Byouin
description: Patients begin to die one by one under mysterious circumstances in a mental hospital. A young nurse named Ikuko Matsuda doubts that these deaths were natural. On day, Ikuko disappears, leaving behind a blood-stained cash card. Her fiance Katsuyoshi Yamazaki ventures into the hospital, attempting to investigate the mystery.

name: Datenshi Kyouko Part 1
description:
A part of "Sexy voice" series.

Three esper fallen angels are sent to Kyoko to play with her.

name: Cranky Food Friends
description: A reskin of Puyo Puyo Quest for the western market.

name: Duck Nukem: Four Feathers
description: After starring in the successful Fly Hard action movie trilogy, you retired to a small cabin in the woods. You grew comfortable in the quiet life you had created. Soon, you also grew too fat to fly anywhere. Then, one day without warning, the outside world came crashing back into your life. It was not a good time to be a duck. Play as Howard the Duck across 20 levels of intense action. Your mission? Take him to Heaven!

name: Raccoon Rascals
description: Climb your way to the top in this addicting one button raccoon adventure!

name: Pakka Pets Village
description: Tamagotchi-like virtual pet game for phones

name: Derringer
description: You're a private detective and you get a letter saying that 13-year old model Miki is restrained.

name: O:anquan
description:
O:anquan is a number puzzle from the game designer of Politaire.

The idea of o:anquan is inspired by the control of a traditional Vietnamese children's board game (Spread the number to score).

name: Grave Spirit
description: Within an ancient land, undisturbed for ages, evil resides in a towering fortress... A young wanderer, without a name and past, has been forced to travel to this fortress by a shadowy spirit who controls his every move. Setting out on an uncertain journey, the nameless wanderer has no choice but to succeed in pleasing the spirit's wishes or die trying...

name: Joshikou Seifuku Monogatari
description: Hero is attending preparatory school for a year. He lives alone and has to earn a living at part time jobs. If he still has time, he can pursue love interests for girls in the neighborhood.

name: Treasure Buster
description: Defeat enemies by bouncing into them and snatch as much treasure as you can, in this unique blend of pinball and roguelike dungeon crawler.

name: 10Battle
description:
10Battle is a new type of “Adding Puzzle + Endless RPG”.

Sum the panels up to make 10 and defeat the enemy!

name: Heart of Saphilamun
description: Sequel to Horror of Cridewell.

name: Fengse Huanxiang 6
description: **This game is playable in Chinese only**

name: Desynced
description: Desynced is a sci-fi strategy game with fully customizable units and behaviors. Gather, build, research, and explore the unknown. Alone or with friends, unveil the mystery of an AI on the edge of self-awareness and uncover the hidden truth in this blend of strategy, automation, and exploration.

name: PD: Prope Discoverer
description:
The setting is a majestic and enigmatic castle... But why are you here?

Follow the clues and discover the hidden cards!
Collect 3 cards to open a new path.
Explore the idyllic, sunlit gardens, the eerie and bewildering castle cellars, the surrounding town and its many secrets.

name: Doppyun Donpisha
description: Hero is an aspiring photograph to cover women photo sessions. But he actually is tired of those neat photos and wants to shoot usual girls outdoors in their natural environment and without being caught by the police. He looks up to a colleague who agrees to accept the hero as his apprentice if he made nude photos of a list of girls.

name: Gall Force - Eternal Story
description:
Two advanced civilizations, the Paranoids (a race of alien humanoids) and the Solenoids (an all-female race) are waging a war that has gone on for centuries. When the Solenoid fleet leaves a battle to defend an experimentally terraformed world from the Paranoids, one damaged Solenoid ship, the Star Leaf, is separated from the fleet.

Only seven women remain alive on that ship: Eluza, the captain, Rabby, the take charge character, Lufy, the brash pilot, Catty, the mysterious science officer, Pony, the pink-haired ditzy tech, Patty, a solid crew member, and Remy, the cute one.

After narrowly escaping the battle, the crew of the Star Leaf decides to continue with their orders and rendezvous at planet Chaos to defend it. It turns out, however, that their ship is the subject of a Paranoid experiment. In the end, it is up to the remaining crew of the Star Leaf to defend the artificial paradise of Chaos from the Paranoid fleet and the plans of the Solenoid leaders.

name: Persona 2: Eternal Punishment
description:
Persona 2: Eternal Punishment is a 2000 role-playing video game by Atlus for the PlayStation. It is chronologically the third installment in the Persona series, a subseries of the Megami Tensei franchise. The game was later remade by Atlus for the PlayStation Portable. This version, released in Japan in 2012, did not receive an overseas release. In response to this, the PlayStation version was released on PlayStation Network in 2013.

Eternal Punishment takes place in the fictional Japanese city of Sumaru, and is a direct sequel to Persona 2: Innocent Sin. Taking place a few months after Innocent Sin, the game follows reporter Maya Amano as she investigates the Joker Curse, a malign phenomenon where people's wishes and rumors are coming true and causing chaos. During her investigations, she and others who join her gain the ability to summon Personas, personified aspects of their personalities. The gameplay features turn-based battle gameplay, where characters use their Personas in battle against demons, and a separate Rumor system, where rumors spread around the city can influence events in the characters' favor, either bad or good.

name: Tile Snap
description: Flip tiles to match them. Clear all tiles to solve the puzzle.

name: Furusoma
description: An ancient ghost from Japanese legend that only exists in sound... In our modern world, it was thought that the sound of furusoma had long disappeared. However! You can capture some furusomas yourself using the on-screen keyboard!

name: Gao Gao! 1st: Radical Sequence
description: The protagonist of the game is a college student named Yuuji Shibata. One evening, just after hearing on the news that someone has stolen a tiger, he goes out to a convenience store. On the way back, in a dark alley, he notices a strange creature, a young girl with cat ears and tail. She doesn't seem to remember anything about herself, except her name beginning with the syllable "Mi...", which afterwards earns her the nickname Mi. Yuuji brings her to his house and tries to introduce her to the world of humans. (which, naturally, also involves techniques of human procreation). But will Yuuji be able to keep Mi as his companion (sexual and otherwise), or will he have to face her mysterious past?..

name: DaisyPop
description: iOS game based on Every Extend.

name: Halo Triple Pack
description: The Halo Triple Pack is a three-case pack containing Halo: Combat Evolved, Halo 2, and the Halo 2 Multiplayer Map Pack.

name: Girigiri Telephone Call
description: A collection of three stories with telephone call as theme.

name: At Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Koroshi no Dress
description: Best friend's fiancé is found dead and naked at the park's toilet. Hero starts an investigation, but then the second murder occurs and his girlfriend disappears mysteriously.

name: Among Us
description: A multiplayer game of fungal cannibalism that combines elements of Reversi and Tetris. Drag and drop pieces to grow your fungus. Surround, dismember, and consume your fungal rivals.

name: Akogare no Onna Joushi ga Shin'ya no Office de Onatteru Tokoro o Mite kara Hajimaru Himitsu no Kankei.
description: Sin descripción

name: Hiversaires
description: Hiversaires is a point-and-click adventure game. Venture down entangled corridors, enter the dark world.

name: MareQuest
description: MareQuest! A profound experience including Mare customization, procedurally generated mares, rng mare dialogue, and accurate mare friendship simulation! What more could you possibly want?

name: World War Toons: Tank Arena VR
description:
Rev up your engines, load the shells…and get ready to roll out your tanks in a cartoon-style, no-holds-barred 4v4 joyful mayhem between engines of pure mischief and destruction!

Choose from various historical tanks, each spiced up with perky specialties and wacky strengths. Fling Mr. Bomb from your slingshot and watch him make a mad dash towards enemy tanks! KABOOM!
Will you choose a speedy M5 Stuart and maneuver around the battlefield to whittle down your foes, or stomp your enemies one by one with the thundering shots of a King Tiger? Mix and match the strengths and weaknesses of your tank squad to crush your opponents! Seize the strategic moment to rain down fire with the unique special ammo of your tanks! Victory belongs to the quickest, the strongest and the devious – may the best tank win!

The desert, snowfields and towns of the battlefield tremble with the roar of your machines…It’s a good day to rumble with steel and fire!

name: Entasy Online
description:
Entasy Online is a 2D multiplayer action role-playing game. It is available on Steam and Play Store.

Entasy is a fantastic world that has been attacked by creatures. Your goal is saving Entasy World from these creatures and become a hero! Natives of Entasy World needs you.

It is a multiplayer game that you may get quests from the characters to accomplish. You will get stronger equipment by defeating creatures in time. You can also buy and sell items on market to get gold or spend. Add friends to your friend list and enjoy playing with them. Entasy Online is being developed by just 1 developer and it is currently in early access version.

name: Open Surge
description:
Open Surge is a fun 2D retro platformer inspired by Sonic games and a game creation system that lets you unleash your creativity!

Open Surge is two projects in one: a game and a game creation system (game engine). It is released as free and open source software.

name: Cov Shooter
description:
Try to survive as many waves as possible.
Upgrade your weapons and stats to be able to coop with the new mutations.

name: Driving Home
description: Driving Home is a short indie horror game, where you drive home after working late and you realize you forgot to refuel your car.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii 2: The Next Levels
description: Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Toad were at Peach's Castle for a feast. When suddenly, there was a rumble. Bowser's airship broke the roof of the castle! (and of course the dining room is on the top floor! How stupidly built). Bowser gets away with Peach and now The Mario Bros and Toad must save her. Bowser takes her to his castle, and puts her in a cage, which, like always, the bros must defeat bowser to unlock the cage to get her.

name: Burden of 80 Proof
description:
Somewhere out in the suburbs, an cubicle full of nonsense sits unnoticed, unmolested. Rich has taken the day off.

At a different office, somewhere else, Peter Kent is embroiled in an over-caffeinated, lightning-paced, perfectly normal day at work.

It's good then, that Rich has arranged for "the house." A relaxing, semi-permanent party headquarters to be used all summer by the two of them, their boozy crew of half-wit friends, and anyone who follows the trail of noise to their doorstep. Unfortunately, a bit of confusion has left the boys with all house and no supplies.

So is it possible to have a good time, the kind of good time to which Rich and Peter are accustomed, without any preparation at all?

The answer, as it turns out, is no. We'll still need beer. Definitely. Right? And some other stuff.

And so with no money, no patience, and a lunch hour long since spent, can Peter secure the supplies necessary to fend off the fearsome hurricane of boredom which threatens this warm, warm weekend?

name: Deus Ex: Zodiac
description: ZODIAC is a set of six single player missions for Deus Ex.

name: Atlantis no Puzzle
description: A short exploration puzzle-platformer where you search for items and decide which one to bring over to your next life every time you die.

name: Cursed
description: Cursed is a scary atmospheric walking simulator game where you'll need to watch your back and solve a mystery

name: Tree Simulator 2021
description: Wood you like marginally improved graphics? Do you like leafing it all behind and taking root in some random field? If so, you are a tree, be the best tree you can be. Prepare for a deeper and more detailed understanding of what it is to be a tree. A true work of art.

name: Road to Scrubville: A Bijuu Mike Fangame
description: Road to Scrubville is a Bijuu Mike inspired fangame. Clarence decides to take revenge on Bijuu Mike once again, will it end well this time?

name: Shades
description:
A curse has fallen on the island of Arulan called Shades and it causes people to vanish and reappear elsewhere. Whatever brought the curse also brought monsters and traps making the island a dangerous place to be. You play a hero determined to find out the truth and rid the island of the curse, monsters and traps, and make the island the lovely place it used to be. You can attempt this quest solo or you can allow three other players to attempt the quest as well, each taking it in turns at various points. Three skill levels can also be picked.

Shades is a flick-screen arcade adventure where each screen is viewed from an elevated angle as you explore the island. You are armed with a sword (a crossbow can be found later) and as you move about the island you can encounter many monsters who can either be avoided, fought or pleaded with but if pleading fails then you can fight or run away. On each screen are many traps and you can search by pressing T but be careful because if there are many traps then not all will be revealed at first. Secret doors can also be searched for by pressing E and these are an important part to complete your quest. Fighting or hurting your self on traps decreases a Physical State bar but if you can avoid battles this can increase slowly if in the green section. Once the bar is empty then it is game over for that player.

Scattered around the island are chests containing various objects to help you in your quest. You can carry up to eight items and any items carried can be dropped or used in various locations to aid you on your quest. Objects cannot be dropped on stairs or The Moors as the winds would blow them away. Taking objects or fighting monsters increase your experience and is used as a high score at the end of the game. As you explore the island the Shades curse can hit you and transport you to an earlier location you visited. Once all the players are dead then the game is over.

name: Art of Fighting: Trouble in South Town
description: Art of Fighting Trouble in South Town contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Beheaded Smuggler
description: A text adventure in which the player takes up the mantle of Sherlock, called upon to investigate into the business of George Wathley. His cousin Victor is suspicious that George has been importing contraband and wants the famous sleuth to turns his skills to discover the truth.

name: Silmar
description:
Silmar is a rogue-like/hack type of RPG, with random generated dungeons, in which you as an adventurer are descending to fight monsters and find treasure. The game was first released for DOS around 1990, with later incarnations running on Windows, Linux and OS/X.

The DOS version has tile-based graphics, and was split in three parts. The first (Dungeons of Silmar) was distributed as shareware, and the second (An Everpresent Magic) and third (The Forward Terminus) parts were made available with the purchase of the first part.

The story is that the evil wizard Syrilboltus was defeated in a war with a dwarf country called Gormarundon, but left a cursed magic labyrinth of dungeons under his tower, crawling with monsters, nearby the village Silmarii, which needs to be cleansed and sealed by reaching the bottom of the dungeons. Many adventurers have tried but failed, and now you are to try your luck.

You choose your character from a list of mixed characters, ranging from werewolves to baseball players (oh, the horror!), and venture forth. As is usual with these games, there is a shop in the village above where you can purchase necessities and sell any treasure you find below. You can reach the shop by using a teleport bead, so there is a quick way out if things get too hot below.

name: Skull Kid
description: Skull Kid is a side scrolling action game. Playing as a skeleton with a chainsaw, it needs to destroy objects in some office and kill people. In the second level, it has to take cover and shoot other armed people. In the last, third level, it is once again armed with a chainsaw and the task is to kill the boss.

name: Sionan
description: You've been sent to collect logs relating to a facility's mysterious destruction. Guided only by a voice and hounded by a robot, you must uncover what happened to the researchers.

name: Keke in the Caves of Peril
description: Help Keke, the brave explorer, delve into the Caves of Peril to amass amazing treasure! Collect every diamond and head for the exit in each level to beat them. But be wary of structurally unsound mineshafts and other dangers!

name: Slayer
description: Slayer is a first-person action RPG using the AD&D 2nd Edition license and rules. Choose from the usual assortment of AD&D character races and classes and venture into randomly-generated dungeons, fighting monsters, and finding items. Dungeon parameters and difficulty are customizable.

name: Sleepthrough
description:
Another sleepless night.
I just lay here, in my bed, with my mind stuck by a fear I can't define. I've tried everything... from pills to hypnosis. All I can get are brief moments of unconsciousness. I think there's something wrong with my brain. It all began when I started to play this game...

name: Schmaragon
description: Schmaragon MOBA is an exciting fusion of Eve Online, Dota 2, and Epic's Paragon. It incorporates innovative and hardcore concepts, such as permadeath, variable-powered heroes, no mandatory match completion requirements, and a toxicity-free environment.

name: Smart Technology
description:
It’s almost Halloween. You’ve been hired to house-sit for the reclusive widow who lives on the outskirts of town. Her home is outfitted with the latest tech, and an impressive artificial intelligence named Agatha controls it all. But something has gone wrong. The AI considers you an intruder and will neutralize you at the first sign of perceived hostility.

Tread carefully. Survive the evening. Outsmart the AI.

Agatha is watching.

name: Smart Technology 2
description:
It's the Christmas season. You have returned to Agatha's realm. You believe you've recovered from all the trauma of your first stay there. Things suddenly spiral out of control when Agatha is hit with a strange frequency and considers you an intruder all over again. You have to survive one more evening against Agatha while trying to return her to normal and decipher why she changed. Things may never be the same.

Return home.

Agatha is being watched.

name: Nova City Original
description: Sin descripción

name: Miburi and Teburi
description: The journey begins! Explore the various islands and find the treasure Masamune!

name: Hello Kitty no Tanoshii Okaimono
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko where Hello Kitty and Mimmy go out shopping, and the player has to answer questions both about the items and etiquette while eating. Mama and Papa appear with them, and other Hello Kitty characters (bear, dog, goat, and plush toys) appear as well.

name: Shrek 2: Castle Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Shrek's Vacation
description: With three busy ogre babies at home, Shrek finds himself a very tired ogre dad. He decides that the family needs a vacation, so he and Fiona pack up the babies and head to the great outdoors in this adventure for the V.Reader from VTech. The trip doesn't go as planned when Donkey tags along. With 8 reading games and activities included, children will build core reading skills in compound words, parts of speech, order of events and so much.

name: LeapLand Adventures
description: The LeapLanders are getting ready to celebrate the Gem Festival, but the keys to Clever Castle are missing! Go on a quest as you play the LeapLand Adventures learning video game. Hunt for keys to unlock the castle and learn about letters, numbers, shapes and colors along the way.

name: Moomin no Suteki na Present
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Moomin franchise.

name: Spidey & His Amazing Friends
description: Go on adventures with Peter Parker, Miles Morales and Gwen Stacy with the Spidey Learning Watch! Hear Spidey say fun phrases and listen as the narrator guides you through games that focus on hand-eye coordination, counting, matching and more to complete crime-fighting adventures. Dodge Doc Ocks lasers to help Spidey get the stolen Energy Star back, count bubbles to blast Green Goblins glider, match patterns to find the missing scooter and choose the correct letter to catch Rhino. Digital clock faces feature Spidey and His Amazing Friends, and time tools include a stopwatch, timer, alarm and cuckoo clock. Go webs go!

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Karada no Naka no Daibouken
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Anpanman.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Yukai nao Tanjoue
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Anpanman franchise.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Countdown to Doom
description: Spider-Man sets out to stop the menace of Rhino, Sandman and Black Cat in New York. The main game can be played in the Adventure Play mode with the full story or the Quick Play mode which skips the story and goes straight to the mini-games. The mini-games can be played in three modes of difficulty with normal or unlimited chance and one or two players. Included with the main game is the Knowledge World which shows and quizzes scientific facts about Earth, Physics and Life. Lastly, there is the Creative Workshop, in which players can customize machines and take cool pictures.

name: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land
description: Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land, is a 28-minute interactive anime video based on the game Super Mario World published by Bandai in 1991. It is designed for use with Bandai's Terebikko system, which utilizes a telephone-shaped microphone to "interact" with the video. It asks the viewer multiple choice questions, and prompts the user to answer by pressing one of four numbered buttons. Although made for use with the Terebikko system, the video can also be played on an ordinary VHS player.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Atsumare! Goku's World
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Dragon Ball franchise.

name: Jungle Quest
description:
During a walk in the park, you found a portal that leads to the mysterious world. An amazing sanctuary populated by animals appears in front of you. But how do you get back?

To find the way home, you have to solve a series of puzzles and explore the mysterious world of flying islands.

name: Sailor Moon S: Kotaete Moon Call!
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in which the player had to help the Sailor Senshi answer the questions of the Daimon Quiz.

name: Q-Taro Channel
description: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Q-Taro franchise.

name: Terminus Machina
description: Terminus Machina is a Deus Ex total convertion mod set in a dystopian cyberpunk future where you take on the role of an operative in the Hex Gen network, a decentralized movement of hacktivists resisting the economic pillaging conducted by the unholy alliances of Big Tech, Big Military, and Big Finance.

name: Dreamer Series: Zoo Keeper
description: A dream come true: you get a job at the zoo as caretaker of the baby animals. Exciting!

name: Ninja-kun: Ashura no Shou
description: Famicom port of Ninja Kid II.

name: Trying to Sing in Static
description:
Ferry stranded silhouettes across a dead sea

A small atmospheric game that takes around 25 minutes to complete

name: Skincrawlers
description: A tiny game made for the Haunted Hunting Jam

name: Into the Woods
description: A short, five-minute experience visually inspired by the aesthetics of PS1 survival horror games

name: Game of Empires: Warring Realms
description:
In GOE, you can choose a civilization with whom you can explore a world you're free to conquer. In doing so, you can establish an empire and immerse yourself in different multilayered stories as you discover ancient civilizations, all while setting forth on an epic expedition towards the fabled Atlantis!
Whether you wish to forge diplomatic ties in a bid to peacefully form alliances or throw yourself into military ventures in an attempt to ruthlessly expand your empire, you'll always have the chance to make history, for better or for worse.

name: Towering
description: Towering is a platform game that is inspired by Red Light, Green Light. When the background is red you are frozen in place. When the background is green you can move but most platforms and objects become invisible. The challenge is to study the placement of objects during red and navigate the tower during green by relying on your memory. Watch out for dangerous obstacles and enemies which will cause you to fall down! Can you reach the treasure at the top of the tower?

name: Plane Racer
description: Fly a plane and avoid meteors

name: World of Football
description: World of Football offers an authentic team-based football physics experience. Dive into straightforward gameplay that's challenging to master, ensuring a competitive edge. Experience true control with intuitive mechanics, devoid of randomness or luck!

name: Transport-inators of Doooom!
description: Rescue Phineas from the Transport-inators of Doom!

name: Floppy Knights: Version 2.0
description: Adds new playable characters, new story and challenge levels, as well as new cards and some assist mode options.

name: Tsukutte Utau: Saru Band
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cricket C
description: Hit the ball to become the best cricket player in the world.

name: The Jumping Salad
description: Join Big S on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Edge: Mech-Ascent
description: Welcome to the world of Edge: invaded. As an AFK Idle Strategy RPG, you could summon a mighty party of unique heroes from distinct races to build your fantasy dream team for winning the arena battles. Start thoroughly exploring the wonderland with your squad to save the world!

name: The Jumping Salad: Turbo
description: Join Big S on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Rollercoaster World 2
description: If you're an adrenaline junkie and crave the rush of high-speed thrills, start building! Construct wooden, steel, inverted, stand-up and even flying coasters that push the boundaries of design with gravity-defying loops, stomach-wrenching corkscrews and knee-weakening speeds!

name: Darumeshi Sports Store
description:
The original Japanese version of the game known in the West as Rusty's Real Deal Baseball. This version has differences from the overseas port, including a very different design for the main character.

The title was officially translated in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Squirrel Launcher
description: Launch squirrels into the atmosphere and explore the clouds. Dodge and shoot down obstacles – upgrade your vehicle to make it further and further until you get to the moon!

name: WarLeague
description: We combined a self-moving chess game with an RTS game to create a multiplayer strategy game with legion battles. Match and combine the cards of your choice, build your army from nothing to the cool feeling of thousands of troops, then crush your opponent, and finally eat chicken to win.

name: You are the Weapon
description: Welcome to 'You are the Weapon!' In this game you are the weapon, enabled with powers that you unleash on your foes! The game is in development and graphics will be updated and improved!

name: Galves Adventure
description: A game made by On Nakayama to celebrate the birth of a friend's baby.

name: Wild River Run
description: Twitch integrated game that involves racing in rivers.

name: Nightmare Breaker
description:
A top-down action RPG with a beat 'em up combat style.
The gameplay loop is similar to DFO with dungeons consisting of multiple fights in separate arenas before a boss room ending with a gameplay score, up to SSS rank, for an extra reward.

name: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Hannah Montana
description: Sin descripción

name: Nancy Drew: Mystery in the Hollywood Hills
description: Sin descripción

name: Devilish Pet Salon
description: When the angel's away, the devil will play! Give this poor puppy a nasty hair cut! Sometimes, dogs look better dirty!

name: Devilish Stylist
description: Create devilish style and don't get caught by an angel!

name: Saikoro Saiko Sebunsu Hebun
description: "All the heroines are psychopaths!" Can you capture the dangerous psychopathic girls who will try to harm you at any chance?

name: Devilish Cooking
description: Angel or devil, you will you have to choose your role in this cooking game which offers two distinct game modes: a classic "nice" mode in which you'll learn more than a dozen delicious recipes and a "naughty" one where you have to ruin the dish of your rival.

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Act I
description: It's Friday night, you and the other Senior Elites devise a plan to throw a party at the rival campus. Carpool across Suncity limits, down into the lawless land of the Undercity. It's Illegal for these two cities to mingle. But is it illegal if... you're never caught?

name: Orbitum
description: Orbitum is a hypnotic rhythm-based reflex game of light and darkness.

name: Devilish Candy House
description: Little Angel wants to eat the cookie, but she needs your help. Trigger the mechanisms at the right time, in the right order, so Angel can eat the cookie before the Devil does! There are hints beside every mechanism to help you.

name: Devilish Cat
description: Your task is to feed the cat until it bursts. The owner must not see you. Be careful and make sure no one is looking at you.

name: Letter Factory Adventures: The Letter Machine Rescue Team
description: Sin descripción

name: Kero Kero Keroppi no Mahou no Kuni Densetsu
description: Kero Kero Keroppi no Mahō no Kuni Densetsu is a cancelled 1993 Famicom role-playing game based on the Sanrio character Keroppi. The game was planned by Character Soft who is a video game publishing subsidiary of Sanrio.

name: PAW Patrol: Storm Rescuers
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixar Pals Plus!
description: Sin descripción

name: Dora and Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Dance & Learn
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Pencil Presents DoodleCraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Sports!
description:
Enter a whole new arena of sports fun with favorite LeapFrog characters! Bowl, block, chop, swing and swim through nine active games. Team up with a friend or play along with Leap, Lily, Tad and the whole crew.
Be a sports star and appear on-screen: LeapTV puts your child right in the game.

name: Frozen

description: Catrophy Trail is a light-hearted physics adventure game where you use teamwork and wits to solve physics-based puzzles, gather valuable loot, and collect gear for future expeditions.

name: Lucky Goal
description: Lucky goal offers an experience of a soccer game through a third-person view. Create or participate in an online match and show who is a better soccer player. A singleplayer adventure is waiting for you to improve your gaming skills.

name: Project Ozone 3
description: Project Ozone 3: A New Way Forward is a pack filled to the brim of mods ranging from tech to magic to even exploration. A Better Questing pack filled with "currently 1197" quests (if you include the reward system). Project Ozone 3 also supports pack modes as they become available (Normal, Titan and Kappa). Normal mode in PO3 will be "slightly" more difficult than Project Ozone 2's due to mod progression. There are still "simple" achievements after the main quests we just use Better Questing entirely.

name: Milton the Alien Guy
description:
Milton The Alien Guy is an adventure game set in a flying saucer where aliens have abducted Milton to study his strange eating habits.
Explore the saucer, cook some god-awful food, and escape the endless void of space!

name: Energy
description: Energy: Anti Stress Loops is a relaxing, minimalist puzzle game that seeks to relieve stress and anxiety by offering brain-tingling puzzles in a calm environment.

name: SuperTotalCarnage!
description:
SuperTotalCarnage! is a fast-paced time survival game where you face endless enemies!
It is our brand new take on the new and popular auto-shooter genre. Inspired by great classics like Vampire Survivors and Binding Of Isaac, STC! will surprise you with thousand of enemies, destructible environments and huge bosses! Slay never-ending legions of monsters while running in circles!

name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Shaggy
description:
Shaggy, the most powerful being in the universe, has come to Friday Night Funkin'!

Using 0.001% of his power, he sings against you to test your strength.

name: My Reaper Girlfriend
description:
One day, you're just an average high school student. The next day… A reaper's assistant?!

You were living a normal life as a student, but on the way home from school one day, you see the girl you have a crush on about to be hit by a car! You jump in and manage to save her just in time… But unfortunately, you take the hit! You wake up to find that your soul has left your body and two grim reapers, who happen to be very cute girls, show up to take you to the afterlife. Knowing that you saved your crush’s life, you're okay with moving on… However, the reapers are impressed by your sacrifice and decide to bring you back under one condition: You become their assistant reaper!

You agree to their proposal and wake up in bed back home, thinking it was all a dream. But when the two reapers show up asking you to report for duty, you quickly realize you might of bit off more than you can chew… Will you be able to help them with their mission to collect souls? Will you be able to find out why two cute girls like them became grim reapers? Will your crush discover your secret?

name: Super Smash Bros. Deluxe
description: This Smash Wii U modpack has a real and authentic look, all the extra skins make sense as alts of the character they go on, fighters from one series are on fighters from the same series. In addition to a bunch of extra alternate costumes/characters, almost all of the Omega stages have been replaced with brand new stages or safe versions of the original stages. Beyond that, aesthetics have been changed, well over 100 new music tracks have been added, the camera is unrestricted whenever possible, and various other improvements have been added within the mod.

Use the changing market to your advantage to outsmart the competition and grow into the best car tycoon

name: Pure White Chord
description:
"Pure White Chord" is a card development mobile game in the two-dimensional magic world. It uses the world famous opera works as the background to create a unique and fantastic adventure story.
Players act as the "conductor" who symbolizes the dance drama of the orchestra, leading various characters from classic works, and embarking on a journey together to find the clues of the "Great Movement of Creation" that leads the fate of the pure white world.
In "Pure White Chord", the process of breaking through levels will no longer be just boring repetitive homework. With the levels designed with RogueLike as the core, every adventure will be a brand new experience.
